CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1972, pg. 19 reads: "Officials - The Modern Grandmothers officers smile prettily for the cameraman following the excellent program. Left to right: Mrs. Ethel Posey, Mrs. Gladys Harris, Mrs. Harry Washington, Mrs. Charles Jackson, president; Mrs. Oteria Nicholson, Mrs. Dorothy C. Reed and Mrs. A.L. Cyrus."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of three men, and four women, including nun, and Mrs. Charles Jackson speaking at podium, gathered at long table in William Penn Hotel for the Modern Grandmothers Club silver anniversary party
